Encryption .NET App

About this Project

An encryption/decryption application built with C# that demonstrates how to implement secure data handling. The architecture uses a strategy pattern, making it easy to add new encryption protocols without modifying existing code.

Currently supports the Ciphersaber protocol, with the flexibility to extend to other encryption methods. The code emphasizes clean interfaces and separation of concerns.

Code Sample

Here's the decryption class showing the interface-based design:

{% highlight csharp %} public class Decrypter { private IFormatter _formatter; private IProtocol _protocol; public Decrypter(IProtocol protocol, IFormatter formatter) { _protocol = protocol; _formatter = formatter; } public void Decrypt(string encryptedData) { byte[] formattedEncryption = Convert.FromHexString(_formatter.Format(encryptedData)); string decryptedMessage = _protocol.Decrypt(formattedEncryption); Console.WriteLine(decryptedMessage); } } {% endhighlight %}

Info: Current supported protocols are: Ciphersaber
